sources.title: Africa Squeaks (1940)
sources.description: Porky is a big-game hunter in darkest Africa. A parody of the live-action feature film (1939). Porky and his run across Spencer Tracy as Stanley. They discover a native village where Cake-Icer has the jungle jumping with his jive. This is a Computer Colorized version from 1992.

metadata.Plot: Porky Pig goes on a safari in Africa, and runs into an assortment of crazy animals, wacky natives and Kay Kyser giving dance lessons in the middle of the jungle.
metadata.Actors: Mel Blanc, Robert C. Bruce, Bill Days
